Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Corvet \Cor"vet\ (k?r"v?t), Corvette \Cor*vette"\ (k?r-v?r"), n. [F. corvette, fr. Pg. corveta or Sp. corbeta, fr. L. corbita a slow-sailing ship of burden, fr, corbis basket. Cf. {Corbeil}.] (Naut.) A war vessel, ranking next below a frigate, and having usually only one tier of guns; -- called in the United States navy a {sloop of war}. [1913 Webster] ||
corvette n : a highly maneuverable escort warship; smaller than a destroyer
